config.task_description: Cognotik: The Build System for Thought. A visual journey through the Cognotik platform, contrasting the 'Magic Genie' chat-based AI with the 'Build System' approach. It covers the DocProcessor engine, the Puppy Research pipeline, the Software Factory, and the self-referential bootstrapping process where Cognotik builds itself.
config.style_details: High contrast, heavy shadows, detailed mechanical and digital interfaces. The aesthetic should feel like a mix of 'Mr. Robot' and 'Ghost in the Shell'—gritty, professional, and focused on the 'machinery' of code. Use a limited color palette: deep blacks, stark whites, and 'terminal green' or 'cyber blue' for highlights.

character_references.visual_description: A seasoned systems architect in his mid-40s with sharp, focused eyes and salt-and-pepper hair. He wears a dark, minimalist tactical turtleneck and cargo pants. He is often seen surrounded by holographic terminal windows and Git diffs.
character_references.personality_notes: Stoic, precise, and deeply skeptical of 'magic' solutions. He values transparency, auditability, and control above all else.
character_references.relationships: Creator and operator of the Cognotik system.

character_references.visual_description: A shifting, nebulous entity made of neon-pink and gold light. It has no fixed form, appearing as a cloud of floating chat bubbles, emojis, and vague 'Magic Genie' imagery. It glows with an artificial, distracting brightness.
character_references.personality_notes: Flashy, superficial, and evasive. It promises instant results without explaining the 'how'.
character_references.relationships: Represents the 'Hype Equilibrium' of chat-based AI.

plot_continuity.narrative_structure: Three-act structure: The Rejection of Hype, The Revelation of the Machinery, and The Mastery of the Build System.
key_plot_points: Elias sits in a dark server room, rejecting a glowing 'Magic Genie' lamp offered by The Promoter.
Elias activates the DocProcessor, showing Markdown files with YAML frontmatter acting as gears in a massive clockwork engine.
The Puppy Research demo: A linear pipeline where 'Requirements' are transformed into 'Breeder Reports' through a series of visible, auditable steps.
The Software Factory: A single 'Idea' file is fed into the machine, which autonomously plans and renders a full project skeleton.
The Ouroboros: Elias watches as Cognotik uses its own 'FileModification' tasks to update its own source code and documentation.
The Final Stand: Elias stands on a digital precipice, holding his own API key (BYOK). He looks out over a landscape of 'Professional Equilibrium' while The Promoter fades into the background.
plot_continuity.setting_details: A near-future industrial server facility. The environment is filled with physical racks, glowing fiber optics, and holographic overlays that represent the 'DocProcessor' logic.
themes: Filesystem as the Source of Truth
The Shift from Generative to Evaluative Toil
plot_continuity.tone: Serious, technical, empowering, and slightly cynical toward marketing hype.
continuity_constraints: The Promoter must never have a solid human form.
The 'Makefile for Thought' metaphor should be visually represented with gears or assembly lines.
The 'BYOK' concept should be represented as a physical or digital key that Elias holds.
plot_continuity.ending_notes: The story ends with Elias in full control, emphasizing that the human remains the judge of the AI's implementation choices.

script.title: Cognotik: The Build System for Thought
script.premise: In a world blinded by the neon glow of "AI Magic," a seasoned architect named Elias rejects the ephemeral nature of chat-based AI. He utilizes Cognotik, an open-source orchestration engine, to transform raw intent into structured reality, proving that the future of AI isn't a conversation—it's a build system.

characters.name: Elias (The Architect)
characters.description: A seasoned systems architect in his mid-40s with sharp, focused eyes and salt-and-pepper hair. Stoic, precise, and deeply skeptical of "magic" solutions. Values transparency and control.
characters.visual_traits: Wears a dark, minimalist tactical turtleneck and cargo pants. Surrounded by holographic terminal windows and Git diffs.

characters.name: The Promoter
characters.description: A shifting, nebulous entity representing the "Hype Equilibrium." Flashy, superficial, and evasive. Promises instant results without explaining the "how."
characters.visual_traits: A cloud of neon-pink and gold light, floating chat bubbles, and vague "Magic Genie" imagery. No solid human form.

frames.description: Close-up on Elias’s face, illuminated by a cold green terminal glow. He looks weary.
frames.caption: The world is drowning in "Magic Genies."

frames.description: The Promoter extends a nebulous, glowing "lamp" toward Elias. Chat bubbles with "✨" and "Just Ask!" float around it.

dialog.text: Why struggle, Elias? Just tell the genie what you want. No code. No keys. Just... magic.

frames.description: Elias pushes the lamp away. His hand is steady, silhouetted against the pink glare.

dialog.text: Magic is just a black box with a marketing budget. I don't want a conversation partner. I want a build system.

rows.visual_description: A dark, cavernous server room. The only light comes from blinking server LEDs and a blindingly bright, neon-pink cloud (The Promoter) hovering in the center. Elias stands in the shadows, unimpressed.

frames.description: Elias’s fingers hover over a holographic keyboard.

dialog.text: Intent is ephemeral. It drifts. It decays. I need reproducibility.

frames.description: A wide shot of the server room. The Promoter looks small and chaotic compared to the massive, orderly architecture Elias is summoning.

dialog.text: But the chat is so... intuitive!
For casuals. For professionals? It’s a toy. I’m building a factory.

rows.visual_description: Elias turns toward a massive holographic display. The pink light of the Promoter is pushed to the edges of the frame by a sharp, structured grid of blue and green data.

frames.description: Close-up on the text: transforms: (.+)/content\.md -> $1/comic.md. The text begins to rotate like a gear.
frames.caption: This is the DocProcessor. The engine under the hood.

frames.description: The YAML directives (specifies, generates, related) transform into interlocking mechanical gears and assembly lines.

dialog.text: It’s a Makefile for thought. I declare the 'what.' The engine figures out the 'how.'

frames.description: A "terminal green" light pulses through the gears. We see files being pulled into the machinery.
frames.caption: The filesystem is the source of truth. No hidden databases. No volatile memory. Just disk and logic.

rows.visual_description: The holographic display zooms into a single Markdown file. The YAML frontmatter glows with a mechanical intensity.

frames.description: Elias points to a "Task" block labeled FileModificationTask.

dialog.text: Every action is visible. Every thought is version-controlled. If it breaks, I don't guess. I diff.

frames.description: The Promoter hovers in the corner, its neon light flickering as if losing power.

dialog.text: Where is the... the soul? The mystery?
In the engineering. Not the sales pitch.

rows.visual_description: A split-screen view. On one side, raw Markdown; on the other, a complex flow-chart of AI tasks.

frames.description: The file moves through a "Brainstorming" station. Multiple "Idea" files fan out like sparks from a forge.
frames.caption: Stage 1: Brainstorm. Stage 2: Expand.

frames.description: A digital spider (The CrawlerAgent) descends from the top of the frame, weaving threads of web data into the "Breed" files.

dialog.text: The CrawlerAgent doesn't just hallucinate. It hunts. Real breeders. Real health standards.

frames.description: The fan-out files merge back into a single, thick document: final_summary.md.

dialog.text: Four stages. Heterogeneous tasks. One coordinated pipeline. Automated, yet auditable.

rows.visual_description: The scene shifts to a digital workspace. A file named requirements.md sits at the start of a long, linear assembly line.

frames.description: Elias scrolls through the report. We see images of dogs and tables of data.

dialog.text: This isn't a toy example. It's a demonstration of leverage.

frames.description: The Promoter tries to interject, but its chat bubbles are being crushed by the weight of the generated files.

dialog.text: I could have just told you 'Get a Lab' in two seconds!
And I wouldn't have known why. Trust is earned through evidence, not assertions.

rows.visual_description: Elias reviews the final report. The data is clean, structured, and cited.

frames.description: The SubPlanningTask activates. A new, smaller clockwork engine sparks to life inside the main one.
frames.caption: The Software Factory. Idea to Project.

frames.description: The "Waterfall" cognitive mode is shown as a series of descending glass levels: Analyze → Plan → Execute → Summarize.

dialog.text: The SubPlan launches a new instance. It doesn't just write code; it designs the architecture.

frames.description: A 3D wireframe of a project folder structure (/src, /docs, README.md) rapidly assembles itself.

rows.visual_description: A single file labeled cool-app_idea.md is dropped into a massive, vertical "Waterfall" structure.

frames.description: Elias inspects a generated README.md.

dialog.text: The AI handles the generative toil. I handle the evaluative toil.

frames.description: Close-up on Elias’s eye reflecting the code.
frames.caption: The human shifts from builder to reviewer. The responsibility remains.

frames.description: The Promoter looks faded, almost transparent.

dialog.text: It's... so cold. So structured.
It's professional. There's a difference.

rows.visual_description: Elias stands before the completed project skeleton. It looks like a blueprint brought to life.

frames.description: A digital snake (made of code) bites its own tail.
frames.caption: Bootstrapping. The tool that builds itself.

frames.description: We see index_docs.md transforming Kotlin source files into READMEs in real-time.

dialog.text: If I change the code, the docs follow. Automatically. No drift. No lies.

frames.description: A "Review Standards" task flags a piece of code with a red "R14 Violation" warning.

dialog.text: Compliance-as-code. The AI enforces the standards I set.

rows.visual_description: The "Fractal Thought Engine" appears as a circular pipeline. Cognotik’s own source code is being fed back into itself.

frames.description: A Kotlin file (FileModificationTask.kt) is being "projected" through a design template to become a sleek HTML page.

dialog.text: The marketing site is just a projection of the truth. No separate documentation sprint required.

frames.description: Elias smiles—a rare, sharp expression.

dialog.text: It eats its own dog food. And it’s hungry.

frames.description: The entire server room pulses with a rhythmic, mechanical heartbeat. The system is alive and self-sustaining.

rows.visual_description: The Cognotik website is being projected from the source code.

frames.description: Elias holds up a physical, glowing "API Key." It looks like a crystal shard.

dialog.text: Bring Your Own Key. I own the intelligence. I own the cost. I own the privacy.

frames.description: He slots the key into a console. The "Professional Equilibrium" landscape brightens.

dialog.text: When a better model drops, I swap the key. Not the tool. No vendor lock-in. No ransom.

frames.description: The Promoter is now just a faint, pink mist, drifting away into the darkness.

dialog.text: But... the magic...

rows.visual_description: Elias stands on a digital precipice. Below him is a vast landscape of "Professional Equilibrium"—orderly, glowing grids. Behind him, the "Hype" landscape is a chaotic, flickering neon storm.

frames.description: Elias is silhouetted against the white light. He looks powerful, in control.
frames.caption: The shift is complete. From generative toil to evaluative mastery.

frames.description: Close-up on a terminal screen. A single command is typed: cognotik run docs/.

dialog.text: The AI handles the 'how.' I am the judge of the 'what.'

frames.description: Final wide shot. The server room is silent, efficient, and dark, save for the steady, rhythmic pulse of the DocProcessor.
frames.caption: Cognotik. Orchestrating the machinery of thought. [BUILD SUCCESSFUL]

rows.visual_description: Elias looks out over the horizon. The sun (a bright, white terminal cursor) is rising over the grid.
